headline: Did Winning the ITF Foreign Exchange Deal Just Shift Corpay's (CPAY) Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier this month, the International Tennis Federation announced a multi-year agreement for Corpay to become its Official Foreign Exchange Partner, enabling the ITF and Davis Cup to use Corpay’s cross-border payment solutions and global payment management platform. This partnership illustrates Corpay’s continued success in securing significant enterprise clients and highlights its expanding influence within international financial operations. We'll now examine how this major client win may...
